instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00281: What is 820-00281? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bluetooth does not work.
threads.message: No signs of oxidation, I imagine it's the <CHIP>U3750</CHIP> with defect

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bluetooth does not work.
threads.message:
More likely <CHIP>U3730</CHIP>.
Check if bluetooth is not turned off first.
Does it appear in System Report?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bluetooth does not work.
threads.message:
the wifi appears, but the bluetooth does not.
if <CHIP>U3730</CHIP> is not worth trying to repair just because of Bluetooth.
